steps.content: Can you find a recipe for gluten-free chocolate cake and create an image of it?

Searching for a gluten-free chocolate cake recipe.

Can you also include some tips for baking gluten-free cakes?
Plan: 1) Search for tips on baking gluten-free cakes. 2) Return the tips along with the recipe and image.
Searching for tips on baking gluten-free cakes.
Tips for baking gluten-free cakes include using a mix of gluten-free flours, adding a binding agent like xanthan gum, and letting the batter rest before baking.

A gluten-free chocolate cake recipe includes ingredients such as almond flour, cocoa powder, and eggs. Image of the gluten-free chocolate cake generated. Tips for baking include using a mix of gluten-free flours and adding a binding agent.
